snippet: There was an air of familiarity and fatalism at Yonkers Raceway in the wake of news that Luis Pena had been accused by the state of illegally drugging horses in 675 harness races.
abstract: There is an air of familiarity and fatalism at Yonkers Raceway in the wake of news that trainer Luis Pena had been accused by New York State of illegally drugging horses in 675 harness races.
lead_paragraph: There was an air of familiarity and fatalism at Yonkers Raceway in the wake of news that Luis Pena had been accused by the state of illegally drugging horses in 675 harness races.

headline.seo: At Yonkers Raceway, Cynicism and Ire Over Trainer Pena’s Suspension
headline.main: At Yonkers, Anger and Shrugs Over Trainer’s Suspension
headline.print_headline: At Yonkers, Anger and Shrugs Over Trainer’s Suspension
